policies.title: Privacy & Policies
policies.subtitle: Your Data Stays With You
policies.p1: CryptoPulse is designed with your privacy and security as the top priority. We do not collect, store, or transmit any of your personal data, including your API keys.
policies.p2: Your Binance API keys are stored exclusively in your browser's local environment using an `.env.local` file. They are only used to communicate directly between your browser and the Binance API to fetch real-time data. They are never sent to any server or third-party service.
policies.p3: All of your virtual trading data, including your portfolio balance and transaction history, is stored locally in your browser's localStorage. This data is not tracked or monitored by us in any way. Clearing your browser data will reset your simulation.
